text: the king and the ogre once upon a time
there was a king named Henry who was
bored of his daily mundane life it
reached a point where he was so drilled
that he decided to explore the world and
experience new things and so one day he
handed over the kingdom temporarily to
his ministers got rid of his royal robes
and wore the garb of a commoner but
before setting out
he took the advice of the Royal wizard
well path you tread is unknown and you
will meet monsters who may blind your
conscience with temptations don't get
tempted by external appearances choose
wisely and remember everything that
glitters is not gold Henry nodded and
set out on his journey after traveling
for hours he was soon tired and decided
to rest under an apple tree unaware that
a poisonous snake resided there he fell
asleep and the snake crawled towards him
- but at the right moment a woman
passing by chased the snake away with a
sick shoosh the noise awakened Henry
what
that Henry noticed a woman with freckles
on her face and curly hair but before he
could say anything she ran away I think
she was eluded by my good looks I still
feel so drowsy let me splash some water
on my face
Oh My look at me such a handsome lad
laughing with pride he continued on his
journey after traveling for hours he
came across an old dilapidated mansion
in which resided and ogre the ogre
invited him for a game of dice on
entering Henry noticed that the ogre had
enslaved maidens to care of his mansion
among them henry noticed the woman who
had saved his life o welcome King Henry
is such a pleasure that I get to play a
game of dice with you let me tell you
the terms of the game sure go ahead
if you lose you will have to give me
something in return I will build a new
castle for you but if I win as a prize I
want to marry one of these maidens Oh
win strangers from faraway kingdoms have
challenged me in this game but not have
yet defeated me hmm we will see about
that do we start the game sure
and thus began an intense game of dice
it went on for hours and eventually
Henry emerged victorious yes take that I
win no okay won't ride I underestimate
you you tell me which maiden among these
do you want to marry looking at the
beautiful maidens Henry was initially
tempted to marry one of them but he
remembered the words of the wizard all
that glitters is not gold I want to
marry her
Elsie why there are maidens prettier
than her they may be prettier but it is
her that I want to marry for I know that
she is a good person
confused the ogre nodded and Henry held
Elsie's hands
ah thank you so much you saved my life
he smiled and together they left the
ogres mansion and rode back to his
kingdom soon they got married and a
royal wedding was held the wizard
blessed the newly married couple and all
the people of the kingdom rejoiced when
a few days passed Henry decided to
challenge the ogre again I am going to
play a game of dice with the over I
shall defeat him once again dear I am
worried that you might not be lucky this
time he may defeat you don't worry
sweetheart he would never be able to
defeat me for it's me and not my luck
that wins the game you tell me what do I
ask for when I win this time he has a
shaggy brown horse in the stable of his
mansion and get me that horse are you
sure you could ask for anything at all
yes my dear I am sure
that was my horse Oh what were you in
that case I shall win it back for you
saying that the King left him to
challenge the ogre to another game of
dice they played for hours and once
again it was Henry he came out to be the
winner victory in your face over this
time I would like the shaggy brown horse
that is in your stable it belongs to my
wife no Roy you may have it that you
will not be so lucky next time
Henry winked and rode back to his queen
with the shaggy brown horse that she had
asked for for the next few weeks
Henry was brimming with confidence and
was blinded by the thirst to defeat the
ogre for the third time in a row but my
love what what if you do not win now I
am sure that there is no one good enough
to defeat me in this game of dice so
don't worry I shall win and ask him for
everything he has and off he went to the
ogres mansion where they played with
great intensity but this time things
didn't quite go in his favor
Henry's ego came crashing down as he was
defeated by the ogre oh this can't be
you cheated this is unfair stop your
whining i won
and now you will give me what I want and
will be your firstborn ah don't try to
deceive me
you know I will get what I want with his
head hung low Henry nodded and went back
to his kingdom when he reached he
narrated everything that had happened to
his wife
don't worry we will find out a solution
months passed and the king and queen
were blessed with a little boy the
kingdom rejoiced and Henry had forgotten
the promise he made to the wicked ogre
one day Henry went out into the forest
to hunt the day passed and Henry could
not even catch a single butterfly let
alone an animal tired he made his way
back to his palace when he arrived he
found the palace guards bruised and
groaning in pain else and his son were
nowhere to be seen huh what happened
here
a giant attacked the palace we were no
match to his mighty strength and we're
at Elysee and my son Oh he carried away
the Queen and the prince we tried to
stop him but we failed hearing this
Henry remembered the deal he made with
the ogre Oh No the ogre took what he
wanted what how do I do now
with no clue how to rescue LC and his
son Henry went to the wizard for a
solution and told him everything about
his deal with the ogre you can rescue
your wife and son only if you get the
mighty sword that belongs to the king of
Oaks ah he is a great friend of mine and
he owes me from the time I helped him
win the battle of Saran very well then
take this this is a rare dragon egg once
you get the sword break open the egg
from which will emerge a baby dragon
that's wonderful I thought dragons were
extinct
they have been for very long
this is the last remaining dragon egg in
the world give this to the Giant in
exchange for which the giant will free
your wife and son the King thanked the
wizard and ventured out to rescue his
family he went to the king of oak who
gladly handed over the sword and
continued to the Giants cave with the
egg when he reached the cave he ran in
and found LC sitting on the side playing
with their baby oh my love at last you
have come I have missed you both we
missed you too
who dares to infiltrate my kingdom I am
King Henry and I have come to rescue my
wife and son and what makes you think I
will let you go so easily
I have something to offer you in
exchange of freedom of my wife and son
what a bribe I do not take bribes I
think you will really like this one it's
something very special
Henry went before the giant and placed
the Dragons egg on the floor is Zeus a
super sword and raised the sword with
great money
he hid the egg it cracked open and out
popped the head of the baby dragon
a baby dragon come to mommy
since so long I have yearned for one I
can't thank you enough it was a little
cutie dragon let's leave quickly before
he stops us again they got on the horse
and left from the Giants cave Henry
returned to the palace with Elsie and
his son and ordered the guards to
capture the ogre the ogre was arrested
and put behind bars all the maidens in
his mansion were freed from the ogre and
King Henry vowed to never play a game of
dice ever again for he learned that
overconfidence is bad but greed is worse
